alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:00AM CST until February 17 at 12:45AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CALLAHAN...JONES...WESTERN SHACKELFORD AND NORTHERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Anson, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Lueders and Avoca around 1215 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Impact, Hodges, Tuxedo, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Camp Butman, Kirby Lake, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 294. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
